title: Salvage and subrogation documentation
dataVerified: Insurer, claimant, at-fault party, salvage value, subrogation recovery
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent salvage valuations. Domain binding verifies salvage company/insurer. Prevents double-recovery fraud (claimant gets payment + keeps salvage). Subrogation recovery audit trail.
